subject: PLAN
title: Planners and Planning Tribunals
description: An examination of tribunals and boards that adjudicate matters related to land use planning, environmental and heritage protection, property assessment, land valuation, and other matters. Topics include tribunal/board history; appeal rights and procedures; the roles and responsibilities of planners, lawyers, and stakeholders; and critical perspectives regarding current and alternative practices. [Note: Additional cost for document preparation will not exceed $100+HST.]
